alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, northern Taylor and southeastern Madison Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Dowling Park to 6 miles northeast of Perry to 16 miles east of St. Marks. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Pinland, Chancey, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Buckville, Cabbage Grove, Mayo Junction, Scanlon, Townsend, Econfina, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, Bucell Junction, Day, Hampton Springs and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
